DOC.brief_summary: Descriptive study management asthma asthmatic Middle East adult population : Algeria , Egypt , Irak , Iran , Jordan , Koweit , Lebanon , Qatar , Saudi , Tunisia , UAE
DOC.brief_title: Multicentric , Transversal , Descriptive , Epidemiological Study Management Asthma Asthmatic Middle East Adult Population
DOC.detailed_description: Multicentric , transversal , descriptive , epidemiological study , conduct random sample general practitioner medical specialist ( Pulmonologist and/or allergologist ) public private sector .
DOC.criteria: Men woman , 18 year age old . Asthmatic since least one year inclusion . Patient 's informed consent obtain . Patient concurrently participate another study . Patient concomitant pulmonary disease . Patient psychiatric disorder . Patient consult asthma attack
